data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Domahovski, Alexandre Cruz, Cavichioli, Rodney Ramiro (2017): Six new Brazilian species of Polana (Varpulana) (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Gyponini) with key to males. Zootaxa 4244 (4): 535-555, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.4.5|64 occurrences
